title: Strangers and Sojourners: A Big Percy Pletcher thriller
description: Fixer Big Percy Pletcher sails from Maine with his Giant Schnauzer Ethyl to foil a Russian-American plot to create disorder in Sheepshead Bay, while his wife journeys to Belmont Park to race her filly. Separately and together they face high drama, death and mayhem
author: Paul A. Barra
